trivialization_at_target:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:177:8: unsupported: ambiguous notation -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `lower_set.prod -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem trivialization_at_target (x : M) :
    (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) x).target = lower_set.prod (chart_at H x).source univ :=
  rfl
#align trivialization_at_target trivialization_at_target
trivialization_at_symmL:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem trivialization_at_symmL {b₀ b : M} (hb : b ∈ (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) b₀).base_set) :
    (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) b₀).symmL 𝕜 b =
      (tangent_bundle_core I M).coord_change (achart H b₀) (achart H b) b :=
  (tangent_bundle_core I M).local_triv_symmL hb
#align trivialization_at_symmL trivialization_at_symmL
trivialization_at_source:

@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem trivialization_at_source (x : M) :
    (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) x).source = «expr ⁻¹' » ((exprπ) _) (chart_at H x).source :=

#align trivialization_at_source trivialization_at_source
trivialization_at_fst:

@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem trivialization_at_fst (x : M) (z : exprTM) : (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) x z).1 = z.1 :=
  rfl
#align trivialization_at_fst trivialization_at_fst
trivialization_at_eq_local_triv:
theorem trivialization_at_eq_local_triv (x : M) :
    trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) x = (tangent_bundle_core I M).to_fiber_bundle_core.local_triv (achart H x) :=
  rfl
#align trivialization_at_eq_local_triv trivialization_at_eq_local_triv
trivialization_at_continuous_linear_map_:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem trivialization_at_continuous_linear_map_at {b₀ b : M}
    (hb : b ∈ (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) b₀).base_set) :
    (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) b₀).continuous_linear_map_at 𝕜 b =
      (tangent_bundle_core I M).coord_change (achart H b) (achart H b₀) b :=
  (tangent_bundle_core I M).local_triv_continuous_linear_map_at hb
#align trivialization_at_continuous_linear_map_at trivialization_at_continuous_linear_map_at
trivialization_at_base_set:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem trivialization_at_base_set (x : M) :
    (trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) x).base_set = (chart_at H x).source :=
  rfl
#align trivialization_at_base_set trivialization_at_base_set
trivialization_at_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprTM -/
theorem trivialization_at_apply (x : M) (z : exprTM) :
    trivialization_at E (tangent_space I) x z =
      (z.1,
        fderiv_within 𝕜 ((chart_at H x).extend I ∘ ((chart_at H z.1).extend I).symm) (range I)
          ((chart_at H z.1).extend I z.1) z.2) :=
  rfl
#align trivialization_at_apply trivialization_at_apply
tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_co:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_coe_symm :
    ((tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph H I).symm : ModelProd H E → tangent_bundle I H) =
      (Equiv.sigmaEquivProd H E).symm :=
  rfl
#align tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_coe_symm tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_coe_symm

@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_coe :
    (tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph H I : tangent_bundle I H → ModelProd H E) = Equiv.sigmaEquivProd H E :=
  rfl
#align tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_coe tangent_bundle_model_space_homeomorph_coe
tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at_:
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at_symm (p : tangent_bundle I H) :
    ((chart_at (ModelProd H E) p).symm : ModelProd H E → tangent_bundle I H) = (Equiv.sigmaEquivProd H E).symm :=
  by
  unfold_coes
  simp_rw [LocalHomeomorph.symm_toLocalEquiv, tangent_bundle_model_space_chart_at]
  rfl
#align tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at_symm tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at_symm
tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at (p : tangent_bundle I H) :
    «expr⇑ » (chart_at (ModelProd H E) p) = Equiv.sigmaEquivProd H E :=
  by
  unfold_coes
  simp_rw [tangent_bundle_model_space_chart_at]
  rfl
#align tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at tangent_bundle_model_space_coe_chart_at
tangent_bundle_model_space_chart_at:
/-- In the tangent bundle to the model space, the charts are just the canonical identification
between a product type and a sigma type, a.k.a. `equiv.sigma_equiv_prod`. -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem tangent_bundle_model_space_chart_at (p : tangent_bundle I H) :
    (chart_at (ModelProd H E) p).to_local_equiv = (Equiv.sigmaEquivProd H E).to_local_equiv :=
  by
  ext x : 1
  · ext
    · rfl
    exact (tangent_bundle_core I H).coord_change_self (achart _ x.1) x.1 (mem_achart_source H x.1) x.2
  · intro x
    ext
    · rfl
    apply heq_of_eq
    exact (tangent_bundle_core I H).coord_change_self (achart _ x.1) x.1 (mem_achart_source H x.1) x.2
  simp_rw [tangent_bundle.chart_at, FiberBundleCore.localTriv, FiberBundleCore.localTrivAsLocalEquiv,
    vector_bundle_core.to_fiber_bundle_core_base_set, tangent_bundle_core_base_set]
  simp only [mfld_simps]
#align tangent_bundle_model_space_chart_at tangent_bundle_model_space_chart_at
tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_model_s:
theorem tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_model_space (x x' z : H) :
    (tangent_bundle_core I H).coord_change (achart H x) (achart H x') z = ContinuousLinearMap.id 𝕜 E :=
  by
  ext v
  exact (tangent_bundle_core I H).coord_change_self (achart _ z) z (mem_univ _) v
#align tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_model_space tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_model_space
tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_achart:
theorem tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_achart (x x' z : M) :
    (tangent_bundle_core I M).coord_change (achart H x) (achart H x') z =
      fderiv_within 𝕜 (ext_chart_at I x' ∘ (ext_chart_at I x).symm) (range I) (ext_chart_at I x z) :=
  rfl
#align tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_achart tangent_bundle_core_coord_change_achart
symmL_model_space:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `model_with_corners_self -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →L[ ] » -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem symmL_model_space (b b' : F) :
    (trivialization_at F (tangent_space (model_with_corners_self 𝕜 F)) b).symmL 𝕜 b' = (1 : «expr →L[ ] » F 𝕜 F) :=
  by
  rw [tangent_bundle.trivialization_at_symmL, coord_change_model_space]
  apply mem_univ
#align symmL_model_space symmL_model_space
mem_chart_target_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprTM -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem mem_chart_target_iff (p : H × E) (q : exprTM) :
    p ∈ (chart_at (ModelProd H E) q).target ↔ p.1 ∈ (chart_at H q.1).target := by
  simp (config := { contextual := true }) only [fiber_bundle.charted_space_chart_at, and_iff_left_iff_imp, mfld_simps]
#align mem_chart_target_iff mem_chart_target_iff
mem_chart_source_iff:

theorem mem_chart_source_iff (p q : exprTM) : p ∈ (chart_at (ModelProd H E) q).source ↔ p.1 ∈ (chart_at H q.1).source :=
  by simp only [fiber_bundle.charted_space_chart_at, mfld_simps]
#align mem_chart_source_iff mem_chart_source_iff
coord_change_model_space:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `model_with_corners_self -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem coord_change_model_space (b b' x : F) :
    (tangent_bundle_core (model_with_corners_self 𝕜 F) F).coord_change (achart F b) (achart F b') x = 1 := by
  simpa only [tangent_bundle_core_coord_change, mfld_simps] using fderiv_within_id unique_diff_within_at_univ
#align coord_change_model_space coord_change_model_space
continuous_linear_map_at_model_space:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `model_with_corners_self -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →L[ ] » -/
@[simp, mfld_simps]
theorem continuous_linear_map_at_model_space (b b' : F) :
    (trivialization_at F (tangent_space (model_with_corners_self 𝕜 F)) b).continuous_linear_map_at 𝕜 b' =
      (1 : «expr →L[ ] » F 𝕜 F) :=

cont_diff_on_fderiv_coord_change:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `local_equiv.trans -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `with_top.nat.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `local_equiv.trans -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Floris van Doorn. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Floris van Doorn, Heather Macbeth
-/
/-- Auxiliary lemma for tangent spaces: the derivative of a coordinate change between two charts is
  smooth on its source. -/
theorem cont_diff_on_fderiv_coord_change (i j : atlas H M) :
    cont_diff_on 𝕜 (with_top.nat.top) (fderiv_within 𝕜 (j.1.extend I ∘ (i.1.extend I).symm) (range I))
      (local_equiv.trans (i.1.extend I).symm (j.1.extend I)).source :=
  by
  have h : (local_equiv.trans (i.1.extend I).symm (j.1.extend I)).source ⊆ range I :=
    by
    rw [i.1.extend_coord_change_source]
    apply image_subset_range
  intro x hx
  refine' (cont_diff_within_at.fderiv_within_right _ I.unique_diff le_top <| h hx).mono h
  refine'
    (local_homeomorph.cont_diff_on_extend_coord_change I (subset_maximal_atlas I j.2) (subset_maximal_atlas I i.2) x
          hx).mono_of_mem
      _
  exact i.1.extend_coord_change_source_mem_nhds_within j.1 I hx
#align cont_diff_on_fderiv_coord_change cont_diff_on_fderiv_coord_change

#align coe_chart_at_symm_fst coe_chart_at_symm_fst
coe_chart_at_fst:

theorem coe_chart_at_fst (p q : exprTM) : ((chart_at (ModelProd H E) q) p).1 = chart_at H q.1 p.1 :=

#align coe_chart_at_fst coe_chart_at_fst
chart_at_to_local_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprTM -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `local_equiv.trans -/
theorem chart_at_to_local_equiv (p : exprTM) :
    (chart_at (ModelProd H E) p).to_local_equiv =
      local_equiv.trans ((tangent_bundle_core I M).to_fiber_bundle_core.local_triv_as_local_equiv (achart H p.1))
        ((chart_at H p.1).to_local_equiv.prod (LocalEquiv.refl E)) :=
  rfl
#align chart_at_to_local_equiv chart_at_to_local_equiv
chart_at:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprTM -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `local_homeomorph.trans -/
-- is empty if the base manifold is empty
/- In general, the definition of tangent_space is not reducible, so that type class inference
does not pick wrong instances. In this section, we record the right instances for
them, noting in particular that the tangent bundle is a smooth manifold. -/
protected theorem chart_at (p : exprTM) :
    chart_at (ModelProd H E) p =
      local_homeomorph.trans
        ((tangent_bundle_core I M).to_fiber_bundle_core.local_triv (achart H p.1)).to_local_homeomorph
        ((chart_at H p.1).prod (LocalHomeomorph.refl E)) :=
  rfl
#align chart_at chart_at
